text: The Korea Rugby Union (KRU) is the rugby governing body in South Korea. ==Teams== *South Korea - the men's national rugby union team *7s - the national men's rugby union seven-a-side team. ==See also== *Rugby union in South Korea *Sport in South Korea ==External links== *Korea Rugby Union *Korea on irb.com *Korea on rugbydata.com Category:Rugby union in South Korea Category:Rugby union governing bodies in Asia Rugby Category:Sports organizations established in 1948 Category:1948 establishments in South Korea
title: Korea Rugby Union
